article:
Cats are independent animals.They are domestic animals, _ dogs,but they are not _ completely domestic as dogs.They like to _ some secrets.They have their own private _ .The domestic cat is a _ and wanderer like her bigger sisters,the lion and the tiger.
The ancient Egyptians were probably the first people to keep _ but they did not keep them _ pets.The cat was a god in ancient Egypt, _ ,more correctly,a goddess.It is an interesting _ that the English people usually _ to cats as females.A male cat gets a special name to _ that he is not female.He is a"tomcat ".In the English _ ,a woman is called a"cat"if she says _ things about other women,but we do not call a man a"cat"if he says unkind things about other men.If a man is not very _ ,we call him a"dog",not a"cat".
